name: Bomb Squad
description:
Find and disarm bombs in this 1x1 game for #bitjam 2016!

Move with the arrow keys. The faster the screen blinks, the closer you are. When you're right on top of it (i.e. the screen is solid white), press the space bar to disarm it. Disarm as many as you can within 30 seconds!

Also, you can toggle audio by pressing 'm'.

Check out the game on Github!
